John Summit_Human (feat. Echoes).mode: Minor because the song is in the key of F Minor, which contributes to a slightly introspective or moody sound despite its energetic beat.

GASHI_My Year.mode: Minor because the track is in B Minor, which typically conveys a darker, more introspective mood.
